as many many people know amazon strives to be earth's most customer centric
company our customer service for our retail brand includes incorporates 50
Amazon groups and subsidiaries like audible.com and Zappos calm we service
millions of customers speaking dozens of languages in 32 countries around the world in our peak we have tens of
thousands of customer service agents supporting Amazon customers we knew that
we needed the right contact center technology to deliver on our promise to be earth's most customer centric company
that technology needed to be scalable to handle our peak sessions or like around
the holiday season it needed to be simple to use so that any contact center
we had in the world would be able to quickly make changes it needed to be open so that we could integrate it with
back-end systems and then it needed to be reliable we went to the market about
10 years ago to look for a solution that would fit our needs and help us deliver on that promise but it was difficult to
find some of the challenges we found where that the tools themselves were cumbersome and the integrations were

we had concerns about security reliability and scalability and last of
all the pricing didn't fit with our model on delivering customer value the
pricing was complex it required per agent seat licenses it was difficult and
complex to manage that pricing to our scale so we built a solution that's
Amazon Connect Amazon Connect is easy to use cloud-based contact center solution
that scales to support businesses of any size it comes with all the standard functionality you would expect to have
in a contact center including skills based routing call recording real-time
and historical analytics and a high quality voice capability it delivers that high quality voice capability over
a soft phone for the agents that we call a contact control panel the real-time
and historical analytics have both tabular form in which you can create your own reports also includes a
real-time performance dashboard so you can see visually what's happening in your contact center the call recording
is attached directly to those reports so that you have the ability to go back and
look at a call and then listen to it right there from your reporting and the skills based routing while simple in its
in how it's delivered through the administration portal it's very
sophisticated and how you can setup calls to route to the right agents based on information you know about the
caller besides the standard functionality that you would expect to
find in a contact center Amazon connect also includes some differentiators for
example it's a hundred percent cloud-based you don't have to have any software downloads no plugins and no
hardware we like to say you can walk in with a laptop and in five minutes leave with a contact center it has
self-service configuration meaning you only have to log into the
console create your instance of Amazon connect by answering five simple
questions and within five minutes you'll be able to take your first call another
differentiator is the dynamic personal and natural contact flows you can create
with Amazon connect contact flows think of those like IVR applications except
they do a lot more it allows you to control the customer experience from the minute the call is placed to the routing
all the way to the routing to the agent I want to show you an example of a
contact flow and the kind of customer experience you can create that's
personal dynamic and natural
so right now the incoming call would route to would would initiate a CRM

minute the customer connected minute is anytime a customer calls in to your
